name: Trisden Pawson Prototype
description:
Challenge 1: Season Cycle - Move the mouse across the scene to change the seasons.

Challenge 2: Grav Fill - try and get the green cube to go through the fuel filling bar to fill up the fuel meter. Avoid getting the red cube in the filling bar or fuel will be lost.

Challenge 3: Quick Lap - A three lap race against another person. Try to stay on the track to keep your speed up.

Challenge 4: Party Time - Blow into a microphone to inflate as many balloons as you can within the time limit.
